DataElement.preferredName: Health Utilities Index During Past Week Ability to See Well Enough to Read Ordinary Newsprint Status
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Response about a subject's ability, during the past week, to see well enough to read ordinary newsprint.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Health Utilities Index During Past Week Ability to See Well Enough to Read Ordinary Newsprint
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A family of generic health profiles and preference-based systems for measuring health status, reporting health-related quality of life, and producing utility scores._At some point in a given period of time._The most recent week. May include the present day._A question about an individual's ability to see well enough to read ordinary newsprint.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A family of generic health profiles and preference-based systems for measuring health status, reporting health-related quality of life, and producing utility scores.

Concepts.definition: A family of generic health profiles and preference-based systems for measuring health status, reporting health-related quality of life, and producing utility scores.

Property.preferredName: During Past Week Ability to See Well Enough to Read Ordinary Newsprint
Property.preferredDefinition: At some point in a given period of time.:The most recent week. May include the present day.:A question about an individual's ability to see well enough to read ordinary newsprint.

Concepts.definition: At some point in a given period of time.
The most recent week. May include the present day.

Concepts.longName: Ability to See Well Enough to Read Ordinary Newsprint
Concepts.definition: A question about an individual's ability to see well enough to read ordinary newsprint.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Status of individual's ability to see.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual is or was unable to see at all.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual is or was unable to see at all.

PermissibleValues.value: Unable to see well enough even with glasses or contact lenses
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Unable to See Well Enough even with Correction

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Unable to See Well Enough even with Correction
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual is or was unable to see well enough even with glasses or contact lenses.

Concepts.longName: Unable to See Well Enough even with Correction
Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual is or was unable to see well enough even with glasses or contact lenses.

PermissibleValues.value: Able to see well enough with glasses or contact lenses
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Able to See Well Enough with Correction

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Able to See Well Enough with Correction
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual is able to see well enough with glasses or contact lenses.

Concepts.longName: Able to See Well Enough with Correction
Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual is able to see well enough with glasses or contact lenses.

PermissibleValues.value: Able to see well enough without glasses or contact lenses
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Able to See Well Enough without Correction

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Able to See Well Enough without Correction
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual is or was able to see well enough without glasses or contact lenses.

Concepts.longName: Able to See Well Enough without Correction
Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual is or was able to see well enough without glasses or contact lenses.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A condition or state at a particular time.

Concepts.definition: A condition or state at a particular time.
